title: go.tools/cmd/vet: go install - permission denied
body:
by **capnm9**: 
7e6f043f2000 tip

vet is now in an external repository, so I think it should be
installed like any other tool in the $GOPATH/bin
directory.

In one case it somehow trashed the go1.1 installation,
and (obviously) without the permission to the go directory it gives:

go install code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/vet: open /opt/go/pkg/tool/linux_arm/vet:
permission denied
